text: This IRM section has been rewritten to update titles and functional names that were changed due to restructuring.

Numerous sections which contained general information on unpostables have been removed from this IRM and can be found in IRM 3.12.32. What remains in this IRM are guidelines for correcting examination unpostables.

The following procedures must be followed to prevent this from happening.
